message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. It's a fantastic opportunity to get your hands on a unique item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of a lower price. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $120?

I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $140. It's a fair price considering the product's value, and I'm confident you'll be happy with it.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save some more. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $130?

I understand you're still looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $135. It's the lowest I'm willing to go, but I think it's still a fair price for the product's value.
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $125?

I understand you're really close to your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I'm not willing to go any lower. I can offer it to you for $130. This is my final offer, and I hope you'll consider it.
I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still not comfortable going above $125. I'm willing to walk away if you're not willing to meet me at that price. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $125?
